long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A easy way of copying content from internet Like Text, Image or even HTML.

Allows you to easily copy, without using CTR + C or CMD + C.

Just select content by cursor and paste it anywhere.
